title: The Tuzla Run
description: An uneasy truce between IRA assassin Declan Rath and ex SAS soldier 'Spider' Webb adds to the spiralling tension as a Tuzla-bound convoy battles through war-torn Bosnia to bring aid to the beleaguered city. Targeted for destruction by Croatian Military Intelligence and Serbian para-militaries, the convoy, unwitting carrier of smuggled arms, is prey to all sides.
author: Robert  Davidson
